title: BaseCoreMajorFacility
description: A Core or Major facility in the mercenary company base

facilityName.description: Name of the facility (required, non-empty string)

facilityDescription.description: Description of the facility (can be empty string)

facilityPrice.description: Price to purchase the facility (non-negative integer, 0 for Core facilities). Used type 'number' with 'multipleOf': 1 for integers (JSON Schema Draft 7 limitation).

isPurchased.description: Whether the facility has been purchased (Core facilities default to true)

upgradeName.description: Name of the upgrade (required, non-empty string)

upgradeDescription.description: Description of the upgrade (can be empty string)

upgradePrice.description: Price to purchase one instance of the upgrade (non-negative integer). Used type 'number' with 'multipleOf': 1 for integers (JSON Schema Draft 7 limitation).

maxPurchases.description: Maximum number of times this upgrade can be purchased (positive integer, typically 1 or 2). Used type 'number' with 'multipleOf': 1 for integers (JSON Schema Draft 7 limitation).

upgradeCount.description: Current number of times this upgrade has been purchased (non-negative integer, max is maxPurchases). Used type 'number' with 'multipleOf': 1 for integers (JSON Schema Draft 7 limitation).
